Plot: A meteor strikes a houseboat in the swamps near a southern town, which causes the people on the houseboat to become zombies. When the zombies run out of alligators to eat, they begin killing people in the town. A local scientist tries to figure out how to stop the zombies.
Reception: Steven Puchalski describes the film a "third rate Night of the Living Dead" with laughable effects, though he calls it "eminently watchable for schlock fanatics".[1] In a negative review, David Johnson of DVD Verdict states that the gore is sparse and story boring.[2]
starring: Buster Crabbe Raymond Roberts Linda Lewis George Kelsey
written_by: Fred Olen Ray Martin Alan Nicholas
